class.name: force_gate_controller/ForceGateController
class.description: The joint trajectory controller executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints and allows for Force / Torque safety thresholding.

class.name: force_gate_controller/ForceGateVelocityController
class.description: The joint group velocity controller executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints and allows for Force / Torque safety thresholding.

class.name: force_gate_controller/ForceGatePositionController
class.description: The joint group position controller executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints and allows for Force / Torque safety thresholding.
